request.title: New request

company-details.title: Company/Organization Details
company-details.part-group: The company is part of a group

certifications.title: Certification (s) Required
certifications.select: Select any of the below certificates
certifications.third-party: Does your company already have third party certification ?
certifications.results: Results of any previous Halal's audit(s) you have received (Optional)

scope-processes.title: Scope/Processes
scope-processes.scope-of-registration: Please define the scope of registration E.g. product produced
scope-processes.attach-file: Please complete this question in detail or attach/send supporting information
scope-processes.exclusions: Exclusions: Are there any local activities that are not included within the scope of the certification?
scope-processes.outsourced: Give details if any specialist operations or services carried out by a sub constractor (Outsourced)
scope-processes.consultancy: Give details if any consultancy relating to the management system to be certified has been provided
scope-processes.HACCP: Number and type of HACCP study
scope-processes.check: Please check off any of the following that apply to your business (optional)
scope-processes.other-production: Any other information on production lines
scope-processes.time-scale: Please indicate if you have a time scale(s) for the following (optional)
scope-processes.employees-num: Total number of employees (working on production lines of Halal products only)
scope-processes.seasonal-product: In case of seasonal product(s),please indicate the period(s) of production for each category of product including number of employees (permanent & temporary) included in the scope
scope-processes.revenue: Gross annual turnover (Revenue) of your business (Required for SQF applicants only )($) (optional)
scope-processes.documentation: Documentation at this is site same as the main office ?
scope-processes.same-system: Does it follow the same system ?

operations.title: Operations
operations.brief-details: Please provide brief details about your operation, So that we can provide a more accurate quate and be better prepared for the audit.
operations.diagram: A) Process diagram of your whole operation and submit it with this form.
operations.diagram-process: This Should include main process and aspect of your operations.
operations.equipments: B) A list of main equipments utilized.
operations.other-sites: C) A list of other sites utilized such as off-site warehouse, processing facilities, storage & transport

appendix-one.tick-products: Please indicate with tick products (Internal use only if indicate in proposal work sheet no need to submit this part)

sales.title: Sales
sales.indicate: For the products you wish certified, please indicate the intended countries for marketing and sales

visit-cost.title: Visit cost
visit-cost.team-visit-cost: Will the facility provide the Technical team visit costs Arrangements
visit-cost.apologize: If you apologize for making the previous arrangements the cost of the technical team visit shell be aded to the finanical offer plus 20% service charges on the customer invoice finish
